transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Hello? Hello, You. Am I speaking with K? Hello?
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yes, hello, is this Kim speaking?
Speaker B: Jung In Choi?
Speaker A: Yeah, hi, this is this Ayeshika from Amber Student. This is regarding your accommodation in London.
Speaker B: Who's this please?
Speaker A: Yeah, I'm calling for member student. This is regarding your accommodation. You are searching in London.
Speaker B: Oh, you mean the student housing.
Speaker A: Yes. Yes, that's correct.
Speaker B: The student housing. Yeah. Yes, we stopped the searching because we are not sure if we get the student housing.
Speaker A: Okay. So are you. Are you moving to London? This intake September 25th?
Speaker B: Around that time. But maybe we will not. We will not get apartment and in the student housing. So I stopped searching. Sorry about that.
Speaker A: So have you already found an accommodation?
Speaker B: Kind of, yes.
Speaker A: Oh, okay. Is it a private or on campus accommodation?
Speaker B: Private, but that not student housing. So.
Speaker A: Okay. All right. Thank you for the update.
Speaker B: Thank you. Thank you for coming.
Speaker A: Most welcome. Bye bye. TK.
